metadata.title: CVE-2022-3661 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in Extensions in Google Chrome prior to107.0.5304.62 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to leak cross-origin data via a crafted Chrome extension. (Chromiumsecurity severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
